name: Ghosted (BaDiHoP, Beescot)
description:
You got cursed and need to live with it. Try and get to the city !

The first step would be to train yourself as a spirit by plucking the turnips in the fields near the spawn.

Next is to get some help from the zombie to get inside the city ;)

Controls :

WASD - Move

T - Force transformation to spirit

Space - Continue Dialogue / Jump / Fly

Shift - Fly down

We only had time to complete the first scene, thanks for playing !
